title: Cannon open league client
body:
Everytime I open league client it makes a temporary file in the directory and closes it and the client never opens. Tried restarting my router / PC. using different internet and VPN. And nothing seemed to help the situation. It seems as if the connection to the league servers is blocked and i dont know how to fix it. I actually have the same problem with discord, my better discord doesnt launch and in the log file i get hash error, which basically is caused by my network failing to connect to github. I think its same cause that causes me to not be able to connect to league, but I cant get around to fix it. 

Does anyone know a fix for this issue?

replies.body:
That might actually be an issue where the update didn't install correctly the first time. Follow the steps in the image I'm linking below, and let me know if that helps!

https://i.gyazo.com/fbe5976243158ecce7efef172951e219.png
